com.percussion.webservices.assembly
Interface IPSAssemblyWs

public interface IPSAssemblyWs

This interface defines all assembly related webservices.

Method Summary
 List<PSAssemblyTemplateWs> loadAssemblyTemplates(String name, String contentType)
          Loads all assembly templates for the supplied parameters in read-only mode.
 List<IPSTemplateSlot> loadSlots(String name)
          Loads all slots for the supplied name in read-only mode.
 

Method Detail

loadSlots

List<IPSTemplateSlot> loadSlots(String name)
Loads all slots for the supplied name in read-only mode.

Parameters:
name - the name of the slot to load, may be null or empty, asterisk wildcards are accepted. If not supplied or empty, all template slots will be returned.
Returns:
a list with all loaded slots in read-only mode, never null, may be empty, alpha ordered by name.

loadAssemblyTemplates

List<PSAssemblyTemplateWs> loadAssemblyTemplates(String name,
                                                 String contentType)
Loads all assembly templates for the supplied parameters in read-only mode.

Parameters:
name - the name of the assembly template to load, may be null or empty, asterisk wildcards are accepted. All assembly templates will be loaded if not supplied or empty.
contentType - the content type name for which to load the assembly templates, may be null or empty, asterisk wildcards are accepted. All assembly templates will be loaded if not supplied or empty.
Returns:
a list with all loaded assembly templates in read-only mode, never null, may be empty, alpha ordered by name.
